Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/127th
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, I-94, and into the Terminal, due to street blockage near Michigan/127th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, I-94, and into the Terminal, due to street blockage near Michigan/127th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
